response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This price reflects its true value while allowing us to work within a fair transaction. I trust this proposal will meet your expectations and aligns with your valuation of the product. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
